com.esri.mo2.util
Class DoubleCollection

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.util.DoubleCollection
public class DoubleCollection
extends Object

An UNSYNCHRONIZED variable growing array of doubles.

Constructor Summary
DoubleCollection()
          Constructs a double collection with the default width and growth size.
DoubleCollection(int initialSize)
          Constructs a double collection and assumes that the next size is half the initial size (rounded up).
DoubleCollection(int initialSize, int nextSize)
          Constructs a double collection.

                        int nextSize)
Constructs a double collection.

Parameters:

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if initialSize or nextSize less than 1.
